name: 1dcat
author: AFNI Team
description: Concatenates columns of multiple 1D or TSV/CSV files

inputs.description: Input 1D or TSV/CSV files to concatenate
inputs.name: Input files

inputs.description: Output in TSV format with tabs as separators and a header line
inputs.name: TSV format output

inputs.description: Output in CSV format with commas as separators and a header line
inputs.name: CSV format output

inputs.description: Omit columns that are identically constant from the output
inputs.name: Non-constant columns output

inputs.description: Keep only columns marked as 'free' in the 3dAllineate header
inputs.name: Non-fixed columns output

inputs.description: Specify the format of the numbers to be output
inputs.name: Number format

inputs.description: Stack the columns of the resulting matrix in the output
inputs.name: Stack columns output

inputs.description: Apply the same column/row selection string to all filenames on the command line
inputs.name: Column/Row selection

inputs.description: Exit quietly when encountering an empty file on disk
inputs.name: OK empty files
